lead_paragraph: Juventus left it late before putting a foot in the Europa League semi-finals on Thursday, edging a stubborn Olympique Lyon 1-0 with a goal from Leonardo Bonucci as Basel, Porto and Benfica also grabbed first-leg wins.

headline.main: Bonucci Is a Europa League Lyon Tamer for Juve
headline.print_headline: Bonucci Is a Europa League Lyon Tamer for Juve

snippet: Juventus left it late before putting a foot in the Europa League semi-finals on Thursday, edging a stubborn Olympique Lyon 1-0 with a goal from Leonardo Bonucci as Basel, Porto and Benfica also grabbed first-leg wins....
